input.sentences: we had a mardi gras parade downtown last weekend .
some very talented belly dancers danced by .
some people wore hardly any clothes .
finally the queen of the parade came by our station .
she had a harem with her | in bikinis and head dresses .
output.sentences: This weekend, we watched the Mardi Gras Parade.
There were lots of talented dancers that danced.
People wore all kinds of clothes.
We even saw the station queen of the parade.
There were women in headdresses that were wearing harem dresses.
